text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco You see, this is why nobody likes you. You single out one guy. Just one and he's probably a republican. Yet you haven't said anything about the 150,000+ dead of #COVID19. Just because some guy on #Fox likes this pizza? I thought that you hated #FoxNews now! #TrumpIsNotWell
